text: kha tæ phracea khxng rea læa khx phraxngkh thrng hı phwk khea di khea nı swn swrrkh hlakhlay xan sthaphr sung phraxngkh di thrng sayya kæ phwk khea phrxm thang phu kratha khwam di cak brrphburusʹ khxng phwk khea læa khukhrxng khxng phwk khea læa luk hlan khxng phwk khea thæcring phraxngkh than nan pen phuthrng mi xanac phuthrng pricha yan
